name: Freedom Metal & Mining, Inc.
description: Freedom Metal & Mining, Inc. is a dynamic company focused on the exploration, acquisition, and development of precious and base metal projects in North America. Established in 2010, FMDE has built a reputation for identifying high-potential mining opportunities and applying cutting-edge technology to maximize resource extraction while adhering to sustainable practices. The company is committed to responsible mining, ensuring minimal environmental impact and fostering positive relationships with local communities. FMDE's flagship project is the Liberty Mine, located in the heart of a historically rich mining region, which boasts significant gold and silver reserves. The company employs a team of seasoned geologists and engineers who utilize advanced exploration techniques, including 3D modeling and geophysical surveys, to enhance the efficiency of their operations. Furthermore, FMDE is actively engaged in acquiring additional mineral rights and partnerships to expand its portfolio, aiming to become a leading player in the mining industry. With a focus on innovation and sustainability, Freedom Metal & Mining is poised for growth in the ever-evolving market of natural resources.

seo.meta_title: Freedom Metal & Mining, Inc. | Precious and Base Metals Exploration
seo.meta_description: Explore Freedom Metal & Mining, Inc., a leader in precious and base metals exploration in North America. Discover our projects, commitment to sustainability, and growth potential.

faq.question: What does Freedom Metal & Mining specialize in?
faq.answer: Freedom Metal & Mining specializes in the exploration and development of precious and base metal projects.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Freedom Metal & Mining?
faq.answer: Jessica Thompson is the CEO of Freedom Metal & Mining, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Freedom Metal & Mining headquartered?
faq.answer: Freedom Metal & Mining is headquartered in Denver, Colorado, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products of Freedom Metal & Mining?
faq.answer: The main products include Gold, Silver, and Copper.

faq.question: When was Freedom Metal & Mining founded?
faq.answer: Freedom Metal & Mining was founded in 2010.
